Name: luy-mohammadramadha
Author: Mohammad Ramadhan Sebwa, Ramadhan Hajj Ndeka, Ismail Were, Musa Murasi Salim Kukuya, Yusuf Shiundu Malala, Yahya Wafula Ojwang, Haroon Albert Msah

Translations.Text: Nafu shikhwaruma imbeli wuwo halali Abasatsa abakhwafimbulilanga obufimbuli. Mana mureebe abali nobwitsulili nikali mbu shimumanyile tawe
Khubimanyisio bili habulafu nende mubitabu. Ne khweshia amachelo kho winoosilie Abandu akeshibwa khubo , khobanyoole okhupaara
Ne koo basuubilanga mbu bali nomulembe balia abakholanga ebifwanga mbu Nyasaye shiyetsa okhubayibisia muliloba tawe nohomba shalabarerera eshinyasio nabo nibalamanyile tawe
Nohomba shalabatila khutsinjendo tsiabu eyi nande eyi, Mana shibalanyala okhupwotsokha tawe
Nohomba mbu shalabahelesia eshinyasio shiokhurisia khulwa okhututuyilia shititi shititi? Toto Nyasaye wuwo ni omuholo oweshisa muno
Koo! Shibalolangakhwo buli bia Nyasaye yaloonga eshinikha shiabio shibotokhonanga okhurula omukhono omulunji nende omukaata ne binamilanga Nyasaye, nabio nibihotselesiye
Ne binamilanga Nyasaye biosi bichendanga mwikulu nende khushialo , mutsisolo nende Abamalaika boosi, ne shibelolanga tawe
Baritsanga Nyasaye wabu owuli hekulu wabu, ne bakholanga eliabalomesibungwa
Ne Nyasaye yaboola mbu: “ mulabakhwo nende nyasaye babili tawe, ye ni Nyasaye mulala butswa yenyene. Kho murie butswa esie!”
Ni ebibie ebili mwikulu nende mushialo, ne idini neyiyie buli lwosi. Koo mularia owundi ulali Nyasaye tawe
Ne obulayi bwosi bwosi bwamulininabo burula khu Nyasaye, mana amabii nikabanyoola niye butswa owamulilila
Mana nabarusiliaho obubii obo, omukanda mulala mwinywe kumutsokaasia
